oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Overwintering and regrowth of Sonchus arvensis roots in Finland as affected by fragmentation and burial in three different soil types
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vanhala, P.
Salonen, J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this study the effect of root fragmentation, burial depth and soil type on overwintering and regrowth of Sonchus arvensis L. (perennial sow-thistle) was studied.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Vanhala, P. and Salonen, J. (2007) Overwintering and regrowth of Sonchus arvensis roots in Finland as affected by fragmentation and burial in three different soil types. Paper at: 7th EWRS workshop on physical and cultural weed control, Salem, Germany, 11-14 March 2007.
